title: University of Mobile President Mark Foley to Retire in 2016; Trustees Begin Search for Successor ...
text: ( Source : University of Mobile ) After more than 17 years as president of the University of Mobile, Dr. Mark Foley announced today that he will step down as head of the Baptist-affiliated college in 2016. 'Since accepting the position of
